content: a quick knit perfect for a day out and about in the cold weather of the north here in the north we are always ready to say okie dokie let s go out and play in the snow in minnesota hats are a classic winter accessory you can knit up this hat in all your favorite color combinations this easy color work pattern can be knit up in an evening super bulky yarn and large needles equal a fast and fun knit materials 60 yards of super bulky yarn for color a 30 yards super bulky yarn color b 16-inch circular needle us #11 16-inch circular needle us #13 set of five us #13 double-pointed needles stitch marker pom pom maker
